product_name: The North Face Gritstone Jacket - Men's
long_description: Combat strong winds at high altitudes with The North Face Gritstone windproof soft-shell jacket for men. GORE WINDSTOPPER(R) exterior remains windproof without sacrificing breathability during stages of intense aerobic activity. Brushed tricot backing feels soft and wicks moisture. Pit zips allow you to instantly dump heat for immediate ventilation. Harness- and pack-friendly handwarmer pockets; 1 zippered bicep pocket. Pull the hidden hem cinch cord tighter to trap heat and seal out the elements. The North Face Gritstone jacket excels at mountaineering and alpine climbing.
short_description: Combat strong winds at high altitudes with The North Face Gritstone windproof soft-shell jacket for men.
